title: Competency-Based Social Sector Education Design System

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Emphasis on mobile learning environments via smartphones, combining offline workshops with online activities

learning_goals: Learners can design by hierarchically decomposing core competencies in the social domain.
Learners can conduct formative assessments using competency-based evaluation tools.
Learners can reorganize and reuse existing content to align with competency structures.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
